Name: Jamie's Mojito
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Fiol Extra Dry Prosecco
Instructions: POUR first 4 ingredients into glass with lime wedges and mint. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir). Fill glass with more crushed ice and TOP with Prosecco.
Review: A light mojito made more complex with bianco vermouth.
History: Adapted from a drink found on the menu of Jamie's Italian restaurant and bar chain. Mojito cocktails, tips and history
